scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:frontend: cd Frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:dist: if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I /Y Frontend\dist\* dist\
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Frontend && npm install && cd ../Backend && npm install
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed! Files are in dist/ directory'
